scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run backend" "npm run ai-backend" "npm run frontend"
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.start:prod: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run backend:prod" "npm run ai-backend" "npm run frontend:prod"
scripts.frontend:prod: cd frontend && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.install:all: npm install & cd frontend & npm install & cd .. & cd backend & npm install & cd ..
scripts.clean:
if exist frontend
ode_modules rmdir /s /q frontend
ode_modules & if exist backend
ode_modules rmdir /s /q backend
ode_modules & if exist node_modules rmdir /s /q node_modules
